tool_description: Validate any phone number in any country.

api_list.name: ValidateTest
api_list.description: Validate any phone number from any country. For testing purposes only.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: Phone number in local format (without prefix) or E.164 format (starting with + followed by country code and number).

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code of the country. Optional if the number starts with +.

api_list.name: Validate
api_list.description: Validate any phone number from any country.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: Phone number in local format (without prefix) or E.164 format (starting with + followed by country code and number).

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code of the country. Optional if the number starts with +.
